sentences.sContent: The economy is beginning to revive.
an attempt to revive the steel industry
The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.sCn: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

synos.tran: 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神
使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播

remMethod.val: re(重新)+viv(生存)+e→使…重新生存→(使)复苏

words.tran: 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效
信仰复兴运动；复兴倾向
领导宗教复兴运动的人；复旧者
使复活，使恢复（revive的过去式）
使再生，使复活；使振奋精神

trans.tranOther: to become healthy and strong again, or to make someone or something healthy and strong again
